message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.PL 

The paper discusses the design and implementation of a system for monitoring and controlling dynamic groups of physical or virtual servers within cloud infrastructures. This topic falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) as well as Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the use of Ganglia, an open source system performance monitoring tool, and the extension of its capabilities, which falls under the category of Software Engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the control element of the system, which allows administrator-specified actions to be performed over servers within service groups, which falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the introduction of further customized monitoring metrics, which falls under the category of Programming Languages (cs.PL).
